author: psteitz
msg: Modified execute methods of Statement objects to ensure that whenever
a statement is used, the lastUsed property of its parent connection is updated.
JIRA: DBCP-343

author: fdmanana
msg: Merged revision 1096252 from trunk
View groups: only open the databases when needed
View groups keep the databases open all the time. This is a problem
once the server reaches max_dbs_open open databases, as it prevents
the server from closing inactive databases via the LRU system.
Closes COUCHDB-1138.

author: rmuir
msg: use a tempdir that will get deleted as CWD, this way any core files or hserr.pids get deleted in afterclass()
